TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NameValueSectionHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler

Docs.summary: Provides name/value-pair configuration information from a configuration section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class implements the `IConfigSectionHandler` interface. The NameValueSectionHandler defines rules for manipulating XML configuration sections.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public object Create (object parent, object context, System.Xml.XmlNode section);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Create(object parent, object context, class System.Xml.XmlNode section) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new configuration handler and adds it to the section-handler collection based on the specified parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `parent` object parameter acts as the configuration settings in the corresponding parent configuration section. The `context` object parameter is the virtual path for which the configuration section handler computes configuration values. Normally this parameter is reserved and is `null`. The `section` parameter is the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> object that contains the configuration information to be handled. The `section` parameter provides direct access to the XML contents of the configuration section.

Docs.summary: Gets the XML attribute name to use as the key in a key/value pair.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.String> value containing the name of the key attribute.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.String> value containing the name of the key attribute.

Docs.summary: Gets the XML attribute name to use as the value in a key/value pair.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.String> value containing the name of the value attribute.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.String> value containing the name of the value attribute.
